001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.context;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
004
005/**
006 * Immutable context describing the flow orientation for a TCP segment.
007 * <p>Records the five-tuple and whether the bytes originated from the client side.</p>
008 *
009 * @param flow flow identifier associated with the segment
010 * @param fromClient {@code true} when bytes were sent by the client toward the server
011 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
012 */
013public record FlowContext(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {}
